name: Unskilled Hireling
description: An unskilled hireling performs manual labor such as carrying equipment, digging, hauling supplies, or standing watch. They have no special skills or combat training and will flee from any dangerous situation.
capabilities: Carries equipment and supplies (up to their carrying capacity)
Stands watch (though with only a +0 Perception modifier)
Will not enter dangerous areas willingly

examples.description: Carries a torch or lantern, freeing the party's hands
Carries up to 150 lbs. of equipment and supplies
Sets up camp, cooks basic meals, tends to gear
Digs ditches, builds simple structures, clears debris
